ud5.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud5.1:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena raja pasenadi kosalo mallikaya deviya saddhim uparipasadavaragato hoti.
ud5.1:1.4: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo mallikam devim etadavoca:
ud5.1:1.5: “atthi nu kho te, mallike, kocanno attana piyataro”ti?
ud5.1:2.1: “Natthi kho me, maharaja, kocanno attana piyataro.
ud5.1:2.2: Tuyham pana, maharaja, atthanno koci attana piyataro”ti?
ud5.1:2.3: “Mayhampi kho, mallike, natthanno koci attana piyataro”ti.
ud5.1:3.1: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo pasada orohitva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho raja pasenadi kosalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud5.1:4.1: “Idhaham, bhante, mallikaya deviya saddhim uparipasadavaragato mallikam devim etadavocam:
ud5.1:4.2: ‘atthi nu kho te, mallike, kocanno attana piyataro’ti?
ud5.1:4.3: Evam vutte, mallika devi mam etadavoca:
ud5.1:4.4: ‘natthi kho me, maharaja, kocanno attana piyataro.
ud5.1:4.5: Tuyham pana, maharaja, atthanno koci attana piyataro’ti?
ud5.1:4.6: Evam vutte, aham, bhante, mallikam devim etadavocam:
ud5.1:4.7: ‘mayhampi kho, mallike, natthanno koci attana piyataro’”ti.
ud5.1:5.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
